remarks:
Distribution of existential quantifiers in a triple conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) 

---

 Distribution of existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
statement:
3exdistr $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) <-> E. x ( ph /\ E. y ( ps /\ E. z ch ) ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps z $.
